function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Tele-treatment technology may lead to potential data security and privacy risks due to the transmission of sensitive medical information over a network.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability and quality of remote treatment may be compromised due to network connectivity issues, leading to ineffective or delayed treatment for infectors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of tele-treatment technology may lead to lack of standardization and oversight, resulting in inadequately trained personnel and potential errors in treatment procedures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of 5g technology for telemedicine and tele-treatment may lead to potential network vulnerabilities and security breaches.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology for remote medical procedures may result in communication failures or network interruptions, leading to delays or errors in treatment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g technology for telemedicine and tele-treatment may lead to insufficient training and preparedness among medical staff, increasing the risk of errors and misuse of technology.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact during traditional screening methods leading to infection risk","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithm for temperature measurement","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact and potential transmission of the virus may occur during the enforcement of lockdown policies by unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g video and ar glasses for remote medical care may lead to overreliance on technology and reduced in-person interaction, impacting patient care and doctor-patient relationships.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based intelligent service robots may result in reduced human interaction, potentially impacting social connections and mental health of patients and visitors.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High engagement with 5g applications may lead to increased social interaction and close contact, potentially increasing disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based telemedicine for medical services may lead to increased dependency and potential strain on the telemedicine infrastructure.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based systems for remote work and education may contribute to increased dependence on technology for human interaction.","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-definition, no delay video consultation in the hospital may lead to over-reliance on remote healthcare and delay in seeking in-person medical attention for critical conditions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote meetings and online education may lead to reduced social interaction and physical activity, impacting mental health and overall well-being.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact as a key channel of infection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to remote interaction and reduced spatial barriers.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misdiagnosis or delayed treatment in telemedicine due to potential information loss or distortion.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for reduced focus on disease prevention and social distancing due to lifelike remote experiences.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact of persons in the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious routines of the covid-19 virus are respiratory and close contact, increasing the risk of transmission in spatialized environments.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of exposure to infectious diseases in tele-surgery due to the involvement of remote doctors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of distributed work on distance decay","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Concepts like \"death of distance\" and \"friction of distance\" minimizing the impact of geographical distance","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interacting with people from faraway towns through the internet may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting distance learning and telecommuting through synchronous communication and video conferences may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if preventive measures are not implemented.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of disease transmission risks in virtual interactions may result in the continuation of contagious disease spread despite advancements in remote technologies.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of de-spatialization and spatialization in pandemic control may lead to a misunderstanding of the objectives and strategies in disease prevention.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of 5g technology","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on combination of digital technologies for epidemic prevention","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects and mental health impacts of prolonged lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large sample survey during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anonymity and confidentiality in survey","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The assessment contains questions about anxiety symptoms and severity, insomnia severity, and impulsivity levels, which may indicate mental health risks.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine during infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and poor housing quality impact working performance and productivity during lockdown, potentially exacerbating mental health issues.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear work-leisure boundaries and productivity-enhancing environment in small apartments may lead to decreased productivity and work-life imbalance.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability bias in self-reporting questionnaires due to under-reporting, under-estimating, and misunderstanding of mental health issues","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of results due to low response rate and recruitment from a single university","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate change contributes to the global spread and redistribution of communicable infections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unstable climates and climate change driving global emergence, resurgence, and redistributions of communicable infections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate risk communication regarding infectious disease prevention and control within the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infections through direct and indirect contacts between individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain health impacts of using silver nanoparticles to control pathogen viability","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of negative health impacts from uvgi technology and bipolar ionization","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited germicidal effectiveness of ultraviolet c due to ozone layer absorption","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Intrinsic relationship between municipalities and reduced social interactions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
